conclusion: Reconsidered the shape of the prism as possibly right-angled instead of equilateral.
Realized rays might not exit perpendicular to the face as initially thought.
Considered that rays could reflect internally before exiting.
Reevaluated the path of rays based on internal angles and potential for TIR.
Misunderstood the angle of incidence as the angle from glass to air.
Considered rays might be internally reflected before exiting.
